name: LAMP stack deployment on AWS
description: LAMP - A fully-integrated environment for full stack PHP web development.

metadata.longDescription: Deploys a LAMP Stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP) in AWS providing a complete development environment. This deployment also deploys a simple sample application to validate the stack is operational.

bullets.title: Operating systems supported
bullets.description: AWS: Ubuntu 16.04 for Apache and PHP; Underlying operating system for database instance

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
AWS: 2 virtual machines:
  • Apache and PHP;
  • MySQL

bullets.title: Software deployed
bullets.description:
1. Apache: a secure, efficient and extensible open-source HTTP server
  2. MySQL: a multithreaded, multi-user, SQL database management system (DBMS)
  3. PHP: a server-side scripting language designed for web development

bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• AWS:
    • Flavor:
      • MySQL: Size = db.t2.micro, Storage = 10GB
      • Front end: Size = t1.micro, Cores = 1, Memory = 1GB, Storage = EBS Only
    • Network: Private IP - in 10.0.1.0/24, Public IP - Computed
    • Firewall:
      • MySQL:
        • Ingress - Only allows SSH, ICMP, TCP 3306 for all sources;
        • Egress - All
      • Front end:
        • Ingress - Only allows SSH, ICMP, HTTP, TCP 3306, 8080, 9080 for all sources;
        • Egress - All

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
1. Downloads latest releases of software.
  2. Deployment takes approximately 5 minutes to complete.
  3. To access the application and virtual machines, please see the instructions in the output log.
  4. More details of software can be found in https://httpd.apache.org/, https://www.mysql.com/ and https://secure.php.net/.
